subject: United States Open (Golf)
Golf
lead_paragraph: Nicolas Colsaerts, who is from Belgium, is Europe’s answer to Bubba Watson: a fun-loving, long hitter with a swing that has changed little since he started playing golf.
snippet: Nicolas Colsaerts, who is from Belgium, is Europe’s answer to Bubba Watson: a fun-loving, long hitter with a swing that has changed little since he started playing golf.
